mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( uid, recv_name, recv_phone, recv_district, recv_address, recv_zip, pay, status, order_time, pay_time, created_time, created_user, modified_time, modified_user ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvDistrict}, #{recvAddress}, #{recvZip}, #{pay}, #{status}, #{orderTime}, #{payTime}, #{createdTime}, #{createdUser}, #{modifiedTime}, #{modifiedUser} )

INSERT INTO t_order_item ( order_id, goods_id, goods_image, goods_title, goods_price, goods_num, created_time, created_user, modified_time, modified_user ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsNum}, #{createdTime}, #{createdUser}, #{modifiedTime}, #{modifiedUser} )
mapper.select: SELECT o.id AS oid, o.uid, recv_name, recv_phone, recv_district, recv_address, recv_zip, pay, status, order_time, pay_time, oi.id AS oiid, order_id, goods_id, goods_title, goods_image, goods_price, goods_num FROM t_order AS o INNER JOIN t_order_item AS oi ON o.id = oi.order_id WHERE o.id=#{orderId};
